data.name: OnlyCans: Thirst Date
data.detailed_description:
Here at Shize‚Ñ¢Ô∏è LLC, we pour our hearts and souls into every product. In honor of the Shize family, we‚Äôre excited to announce the new Heritage 2020 Collection!

We‚Äôre bringing back every flavor since our flagship taste from 1744. It‚Äôs time to enjoy Cherry Pop, Gamer Energy, Pineapple Pizza, and so many more at your local grocer. Our cans have so much personality, and you‚Äôre sure to find a favorite. See our collection today - they‚Äôll be waiting for you!

Play OnlyCans: Thirst Date, The World's First (& Last) Erotic Can Photography Experience for FREE in the brand new and ultra-shiny Hot & Steamy Edition!

Gameplay


Experience Cans! With this clicking based rhythm game, anyone can be an erotic can photographer. Click to "snap" and "spray" at just the right moments to get combos, high scores, and even feedback from our models. Progress from our base flavors to the more unconventional fan favorites, and learn more about the Shize‚Ñ¢Ô∏è brand history while meeting some amazing, flirty, and outrageous cans along the way.

Stream Safe


The game is 100% safe for streaming on Twitch and YouTube!

Whilst the content is bubbly, fizzy and all-around tantalising, our candid can photography game is safe for streaming - and you're bound to have a good time with your viewers as you piece together the story of Shize‚Ñ¢Ô∏è and reveal each and every one of our beautiful sodas!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM / DirectX 11+ support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Integrated graphics NOT supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM / DirectX 11+ support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Integrated graphics NOT supported
